website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its quiet operation and the fact that it can put out a lot of light. Very nice quality for the price.
pros: Great quality for the money, this fan makes little noise but moves a lot of air
Unlike most fans, this design uses full-sized light bulbs, giving you a lot more lighting options

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of this fan!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of getting the POS fans they sell at the local Home Depot and decided to splurge for one of these. I'm glad I did! The fan is extremely quiet, no wobble, and moves a lot of air. Also, the four lights are selectable to use only two at a time, very nice when you don't need to be blinded by the light. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, doesn't move much air.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive ceiling fan. Was purchased to replace my 32 year-old Emerson fan that fell out of the ceiling when a set screw loosened. New design has a pin that prevents this from happening. Should have paid more attention to the specs for air movement when purchasing. This particular model is a low air-mover unless operated at high speed. Not a big deal since this is a quiet fan, but still annoying. Fan came with four 75w equivalent CFL bulbs. Really lights up the room. Fan installed by electrician so can't comment on ease of installation. Instructions looked easy enough to install, but probably does require 2 people if you are not skilled.
customer_reviews.author: PaulBR

customer_reviews.title: ... we had replaced our fan last year with this fantastic model. It's super quiet
customer_reviews.text: I only wish we had replaced our fan last year with this fantastic model. It's super quiet, distributes a great deal of air even on medium, the lights can be set on/off in multiple variations for the four bulb layout, and was incredibly easy to install. We added a universal remote system to it and made the unit even more user friendly for just $30. I would eagerly buy this unit again for any additional rooms that might need one!
customer_reviews.author: spiderguy

customer_reviews.title: Installed like a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Emerson fan install. 95% of the fans I install are Hunter or Hampton Bay so I was a bit unsure about this one but the customer wanted it. Installed like a breeze. A bit more cumbersome than the other brands but nothing out of the ordinary. Very similar process. Great looking fan and quiet. Like it. Nice purchase. Would definitely get it again for someone who wants an all white fan that can be mounted all three ways.
customer_reviews.author: TnT

customer_reviews.title: Wind maker
customer_reviews.text: This ceiling fan is very easy to install and works just a expected. We made sure it was not too big for the space (kitchenette). The fan blades were two-colors, and one matched the kitchen cabinets just fine. The triple light switch was a surprise... pull three times to rotate through the four lights... I would prefer just a double switch (on and off), since we often let the fan run without the light being on (there's only one switch to control the total fan).
customer_reviews.author: William Miller

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few $ on this Emerson Fan and you will literally feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: Given the number of moving parts required of a ceiling fan - I hadn't thought too much about quality when purchasing a new fan. Lucky for me, I purchased Emerson as my bedrooms were already wired with older versions and I wanted to keep the remote switching in place. These are rock solid fans and you won't be sorry with the purchase. Spend a few $ on Emerson Fans and you will literally feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Mangan

customer_reviews.title: effective enough
customer_reviews.text: I love emerson fans. The last time I needed a fan I bought one that was around $600. This time I bought this fan to save money hoping their product still stands true and it does. Unfortunately, this fan does have a wobble that we can't seem to shake (no pun intended) but I would take this fan over ANY home depot/lowes product. It definitely cools the room and looks great. Well done, Emerson.
customer_reviews.author: patricia g marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good no frills fan
customer_reviews.text: For the price and features, this is a good fan. It seems to be decent quality and it gets the job done. If you're flush mounting it and you're short or have high ceilings, you may need to get longer ball chains. I have LED light bulbs in it I didn't remove any stars for this because it's not an issue with the product itself, but it's worth noting that despite coming from the Amazon warehouse, the fan arrived damaged. Since it's cosmetic damage I kept it anyway, but it bothered me that when I told Amazon about it, they didn't seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: ssnj

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting, but doesn't move much air.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan, but doesn't move much air. I was concerned about the lighting since so many fans have inadequate lights. I searched the internet for hours upon hours over a month or more to find the perfect fan. It is quiet and the lights are bright and the pull chain allows for either two or four lights to be on. My old fans were like that, but moved so much more air. I'm not sure why newer fans have a problem with this. After all, isn't the purpose of a ceiling fan to move air?? Even on the high setting, it feels like my old fan on the medium setting.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: It is truly a beautiful lamp fan and it is so quiet when running ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in just 2 days and my electrician installed it with no problems. He remarked to me about how quiet it ran. It is truly a beautiful lamp fan and it is so quiet when running you have to look up to see if the blades are turning (which of course they are). Wish I had known about Emerson Ceiling Fans sooner because it is the most quiet fan in my house. It has 3 different speeds and also has a reverse direction switch. The price was great for the quality. When you don't have air conditioning, these ceiling fans are a must when the hot weather comes in LA.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan except for color issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, quality fan and is very quiet. It works well. Only issue was that the fan was a bronze color and the light fixture portion that attaches was white. After the light globe was installed, when you stood back you could see the white post portion of the light fixture above the globe. Looked bad. The light fixture should have also been the same bronze color as the fan housing and mount plate. I luckily had a similar bronze/dark brown spray paint on hand to paint it. We already had it totally installed by the time we noticed it and didn't feel like disabling the whole thing to return it......so I painted it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Budget minded quality! Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Ceiling fans are so exhausting to shop for, but if one of these Emerson fans fit what you’re looking for it’s definitely worth it. I previously purchased another brand’s “pro/contractor” model for another room and it is OK, but the Emerson is definitely the better fan. Blades didn’t need balancing and I think it even came with bulbs. It’s powerful enough for me and is about as quiet as a ceiling fan gets. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love with Edison Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan for the price. We had it installed it flush mount against the ceiling with a switch on the wall that allows us to control the speed of the fan. We also installed without the shades and used Edison bulbs instead of regular bulbs. I love the look and the fan is quiet enough to not bother me when I am sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J

customer_reviews.title: Great price point for an Emerson
customer_reviews.text: Great price point for an Emerson. I was advised to choose Emerson when using a long down-rod because they are exceptionally quiet and don't vibrate. Quality makes them more expensive than other brands. I could not believe the price of this one. Very pleased with performance, months after install.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Eileen

customer_reviews.title: noisy fan motor
customer_reviews.text: Fan motor is noisy and very annoying. I noticed at lower speeds it is even more pronounced. I would not recommend this fan if you are looking for some peaceful time. I would hope manufacturer looks into solving this problem. I have several fans in my home and this sis by far the the loudest and a very disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bob Toupin

customer_reviews.title: Love my fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome! It is so quiet and on low provides a gentle breeze, just perfect for California fall nights. I also think it's very good looking. My order came quickly and all parts were included. It only took us maybe 30 minutes to install. I'm very happy with my purchase and highly recommend this Emerson fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice Fan! Quiet and easy to install. Best of all.....no wobble! None at ALL!!! I didn't even have to use the balance kit. I recently installed 3 high dollar Hunter fans. All 3 of them needed multiple balance kits . The blades on the Emerson are balanced within 1 gram. Very nice fan!
customer_reviews.author: David Piscitello

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks...it could stand to be a bit brighter so if you like a darker/warmer feel to the room it's PERFECT. I would have liked it to be a touch brighter. It's b/c the globe is the yellow/amber color. Which is beautiful but makes it darker light though.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: nice and small as needed
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, nice and small as needed, easy to install, appears to be very well made. Hopefully it lasts for years and years. Its a bit different than the standard Hunter or Big Box stuff so I'll glad pay any premium to have something the rest of the neighborhood doesn't have. I installed 3 40 watt LED bulbs and its just the right about of light for a 12 x 12 room.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and lights are so bright we had to turn two off.
customer_reviews.text: This was a job for the pros which I purchased and I wouldn't have been able to do alone. Works great with all the bells & ...
customer_reviews.author: irie

customer_reviews.title: Great fan--great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan for the master bedroom in my new villa last November. It is a great fan--very attractive and good quality. My electrician told me to buy this brand rather than the cheaper ones available at the local hardware store. I got a great price for this fan through Amazon--much cheaper than the local fan/lights stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. This replaced an old ceiling fan. Super quiet & well balanced. Love the look. Great instructions
customer_reviews.author: Cyn57

customer_reviews.title: Love hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: I loved this fixture for the first 13 months. Needed 180 watts which is hard to find in an enclosed all white ceiling fan. I purchased it 10-19 and installed 11 -18 and on 12-25-19 the lights would not stay on. Hoping a YOU TUBE video will help. It's the perfect fan for our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nixie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Fan
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace old emerson fan that wore out. Ball that holds fan was not the same, No Biggy, I replaced the whole thing. Quiet and high Quality.
customer_reviews.author: DuraOtto

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan
customer_reviews.text: For my bed room and I Love it. But UPS left the package in the lobby instead bring to my apt door with out my signature. My neighbor saw and inform me.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Purchase it
customer_reviews.text: You will find this ceiling fan is a step up in quality. The simplest thing as a hook to hang the fan unit on while wiring is really a nice plus when installing. Has ran 24/7 since arriving and I am purchasing two more as soon as I complete this review!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Schneiderwent

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable & well made. Works well 9 mo. later
customer_reviews.text: It is not a high priced unit, but we got more than we expected. I have used products with Emerson Electric motors in the past & been very satisfied, but never purchased their ceiling fans. Good directions, all parts included, and flush mountable ,if desired.
customer_reviews.author: ROY M

customer_reviews.title: Hardware too soft and globe crooked
customer_reviews.text: The screws are all way to soft. They are too big for P2 bit and too small for a P3 bit. They strip very easily. The glass globe is prone to not appear straight. Very hard to adjust to make flat. Otherwise pretty good fan. Update - fan stopped working after 16 months.
customer_reviews.author: hossola

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this fan is a good value. I bought one as a replacement for a bedroom fan that was a cheaper builder fan that was having problems. Very easy to install and seems to be of good quality. Very smooth and no wobble even on the highest fan speed. The globes for the lights are of heavy glass material and of good quality. I appreciate the way the globes mount with spring clips - no more set screws for retaining globes. I was so impressed I bought a second fan and had the same good experience. I would recommend this fan highly.
customer_reviews.author: huiez

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend. after reading some of the other reviews here ...
customer_reviews.text: came mostly assembled with clear instructions on how to finish. quiet smooth operation that balanced right out of the box. highly recommend. after reading some of the other reviews here i added remotes and they connected smoothly with this fan and operate very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I am sure the fan I received is fine, however
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the fan I received is fine, however, I did not get the one I ordered. I ordered the 4 light, 50 inch brass ceiling fan. I received the 3 light 42 inch fan in bronze. These are two completely different model numbers. Unfortunately I was out of town and now cannot return it. I have other Emerson fans installed in my home, they are high quality fixtures. I will reorder again, hopefully I get the right one this time.
customer_reviews.author: D Nevi

customer_reviews.title: Emerson is the brand to buy now.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 30 year old Hunter fan with a new Hunter fan and then this Emerson fan after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: E. campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fans
customer_reviews.text: If these meet your look and control requirements, just get them. They are quite easy to setup and wire, and work great.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan simply because it accepts full size light bulbs, as opposed to the ridiculous candleabra bulbs which put out no light, and need replaced on a monthly basis. I have LED bulbs in this, and it puts out good light. It was easy to install, and does not wobble. It has 4 lights, and the pull cord makes them toggle between 2 bulbs on, the other 2 bulbs on, and all 4 on at the same time, just FYI, so you don't think you hooked it up wrong, or you have bulbs out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, hard to install
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan now that it's up, but we couldn't install it. After trying for many hours, we called our electrician. It took him a few about 20 minutes. It looks great, works well, and best of all, it gives out lots of light but still dims with our dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: 2boymom

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected; subpar
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than expected to install and the blades are thin and looks cheap. Also the cap that attaches to the ceiling was a little small so didn't fit well over the hole that was originally there for the other fan. Otherwise works well. I would have returned it however if it wasn't a hassle to install it or to return it.
customer_reviews.author: lubyoo24

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. One person can do this, which is always nice. Basic tools needed (screwdriver and a standard wire cutter/stripper).
customer_reviews.author: ViziNO!

customer_reviews.title: Crooked light
customer_reviews.text: Bent light housing, made the whole thing look crooked. Put it all together to find that out... and couldn't just bend it back, it was put on that way. this made me wish I bought it from home depot :( I'm an engineer that has installed many fans.
customer_reviews.author: DanSmithCamps

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan, it's very pretty, doesn't look tacky at all. It's so quiet you barely hear it at all. And you get a nice overhead breeze if you don't want your AC on all the time. I ordered the wrong color though, I wanted the regular polished brass and ordered the antique by mistake, but I didn't want to deal with shipping back. The regular brass would have matched my home better, but really not quite a big deal. There are several different colors so double check you are getting the correct one.
customer_reviews.author: Praisinhim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan...purchased the same one before but different color. Looks great quiet and has several speeds.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: Just now had it installed but so far I love it. Very quiet and smooth running. The oil rubbed bronze is very good looking against my new white ceiling and also like that it uses regular size 60w bulbs. It arrived in good condition and my installer said it was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: LADYD

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much, I just bought another one for the other living room! You can tell it is of better quality just by taking it out of the box. I installed 4 other "Hunter" fans in the bedrooms for a similar price and I wish I would of bought 6 of these Emerson's.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Tocco

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ceiling fan. It is really easy to install and I did it myself. This fan looks a lot like the ones which our builder installed. So it matched with other ceiling fans. Only problem I have is with the light fixture. Since I was looking for lights which can take regular LED bulbs, I had to go with this flower type lights and it is too bright with light bulbs exposed. I wish there was one with bowl light which takes regular LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: abjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy....
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I needed a good looking and functional ceiling fan near my fireplace, and this one absolutely works! Looks great and almost no sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily enough. It is still working well
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily enough. It is still working well. No wobbling of the blades. Lights appeared bright at first, then seemed dim after a while, but eventually the bulbs can and will need to be replaced. It is nice looking, basic and classic.
customer_reviews.author: RedSpice

customer_reviews.title: It's a great fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great fan for the price. It makes a low noise, but it isn't bothersome. My brother installed it, and his only complaint was the multitude of pieces and how it took him 2 hours to take down the old fan and put up the new one.
customer_reviews.author: jarpc

customer_reviews.title: Emersom Pro Series 5 inch 5 blade indoor ceiling fan, Oil rubbed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Beautiful fan. I purchased two for my daughters' house. She built it and did not install fans upstairs. I couldn't believe that I found the model and manufacture of the fixtures we selected for the house. The price was unexpected (they were 50%off the original) We are very pleased with our purchase. They are quiet and just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth y. williams

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty!
customer_reviews.text: I used this fan in our RV bedroom. It's the perfect size. There are three speeds. It's very quiet. It is not remote controlled, there is a chain to pull.
customer_reviews.author: P. Olson

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the picture and I am very happy with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the summer white fan and it is very quiet so thank you for all of the previous positive reviews. It looks just like the picture and I am very happy with the looks of it and the quietness.
customer_reviews.author: Marzhane

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this fan!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best cielng fan I've ever bought. It's quiet, circulates air twice as much as others we have, easy to install and uses regular bulbs not specialty. I will be buying another one in a couple months!
customer_reviews.author: L. Blakley

customer_reviews.title: problem with pull chain
customer_reviews.text: hardly used this all winter and i just went to turn it on for the first time and the pull chain for the fan that turns on fan when i pulled it it turned on but is frozen and i can't turn it off unless i use the switch.???? WHY?
customer_reviews.author: Roseann B. Voigt

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this fan! I have had this fan on in my bedroom 24/7 for over 2 years with no problems!! It's so quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie B

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking fan, whisper quiet. I replaced a 25-year-old Emerson fan with this new fan because I wanted a light fixture. Adding an Emerson light kit to my old fan would have cost more than buying the new fan with lights.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Installed the fan two months ago and it was great until the chain for the light control snapped from the plastic housing. Attempted contacting the company but no response, so now we have no way of turning off the lights on a basically brand new fan.
customer_reviews.author: fhumphrey04

customer_reviews.title: Installed and love them
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet added the pecham universal remote installed three of these in my house super quiet and what a difference.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, easy to install. Quiet and efficient.. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Berardesco

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan & lights.  Bad if you want to use a longer downrod
customer_reviews.text: Fan is very good, my only problem is that I wanted to install it with an 18 inch downrod. (Fan comes with 4 inch long downrod) This fan uses a 1/2 inch rod and all the newer style fans use 3/4 inch rods. I tried Home Depot & Lowe and they do not carry 1/2 inch rods. The guy at lowes said that most manufacturers changed to 3/4 inch rods a long time ago. Maybe this fan was leftover from who knows when. I was lucky that Lowes had a kit to convert the rod.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Emerson ceiling fans
customer_reviews.text: These fans (we bought 2) are good-looking, circulate the air well, and provide a good amount of soft lighting. The price was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.O.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful fan and was delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan and was delivered quickly. Other reviews said the fan hummed and it does. Sometimes it bothers my husband, but I can't say I wouldn't have ordered it because of the hum. The quality of the unit is extremely good.
customer_reviews.author: reen5horse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan.
customer_reviews.text: Ours didn’t come with a remote. But we live the look and it is so quiet. Looks great in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product and very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan and light! I can’t stop staring at it.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: works great, installed 5 more to different rooms and matched with what the builder installed
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised. The control chain for the fan ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. The control chain for the fan binds. Hope they fixed this in future models. Have them tell me if they have a solution to this minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Johnston

customer_reviews.title: It really looks nice in my family room
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the fan supersedes the prize. It really looks nice in my family room. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Moves air pretty well, but could do a little better
customer_reviews.text: very quiet fan. I have installed many fans over the years and this is the quietest I have ever installed (quiet motor). Moves air pretty well, but could do a little better. It works well for the bedroom it is in.
customer_reviews.author: David J Prows

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking The quality is very good the fan is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking The quality is very good the fan is quiet my only complaint is that it is very difficult to change light bulbs because the pull chains have wood handles that are impossible to get off i ended up just clipping the wood thing off with metal cutters just to change the bulb
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: and has excellent lighting. It was pretty easy for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fan for my son's room, and it has absolutely lived up to its name. It's very quiet, moves the air well, and has excellent lighting. It was pretty easy for my husband to assemble and put up. I won't hesitate to buy another Emerson when we need another fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jmfh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 50's Decor home
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for the living of our new (old) home which was build with quality wood trims and plaster walls in 1952. The fan fits the décor perfectly and was an easy installation. It looks like it was original to the house, operates silently and has appropriate light for the setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan was easy to assemble, looks nice, and the fan is quiet and steady as a rock during operation. My only minor complaint is that the bulbs aren't very bright.
customer_reviews.author: J. York

customer_reviews.title: Works great, moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: Works great, moves a lot of air. Comes with balancing kit, which is the first time I’ve had that included in a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fan.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. The only problem is the cap that goes around the rod against the ceiling is too small for a remote controlled receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Love This Fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking, very effective fan. Has lots of adjustments for amount of air flow. Have used it now for several HOT months and am most satisfied. We live on Maui and good fans are important. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Faith

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fan!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking fan! A true bronze look-not just something that looks spray painted brown. Don't you hate that? And substantial in size. A couple nice things I wasn't expecting: it came with the nice cfl bulbs and also there are three options for the lights-1. all four on, or 2. just the two side lights on, or 3. just the two front and back lights on( instead of having to dim them). The blades are reversible for color preference. I would call the lighter side more of a"gunstock oak" color. And the reverse a dark espresso brown. Took my handyman about an hour and a half to remove my old light & install this fan. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: onehotmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ceiling fan. Looks great - high quality. Works great too. Suggest you get a remote for it and you will like it even better ;-)
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: the fan installed fairly easily, it looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never installed a ceiling fan and I have to say, the fan installed fairly easily, it looks fantastic, it’s very quiet and so far i am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas  Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Looks good... fan speeds not to fast
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my tv room. Compliments my theme.
customer_reviews.author: nats

customer_reviews.title: Good fans, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: These are fine fans. They look fine. They work fine. They are not fancy. No complaints really.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyIvan

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice, quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, quiet, fan with only one very minor problem; the wind from the blades makes the pull cord vibrate and it can be a little annoying. I solved it by wrapping the pull cord around a shade. Had no problem installing, and very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: clp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It's good quality and at a good price. Installation was very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. PoopyButthole

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, easy to install too.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works well. I will be buying three more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer in SC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is aesthetically pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Blair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fan motor is awesome. It moves air faster than expected without noise or shaking
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bailey

customer_reviews.title: A Great Fan at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This ceiling fan is just beautiful. I love it's looks and how smoothly it runs. Installation was a snap especially with using Amazon certified installers.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyPatty

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, quiet and easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Fan was delivered with no shipping problems. This is my third Emerson fan that I've bought for different rooms in our home. Did my research along time ago and found for the money and quality, the Emerson fan was a good product. These fans are easy to install. The best part with these Emerson fan's are that they are quiet and have no 'wobble'.
customer_reviews.author: supertobe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Our electrician said it was a very good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good names in fans.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, and very stylish. Will be nice in our master bedroom. Was advertised as a 50 inch fan but when I recieved it , it was a 52' blade.
customer_reviews.author: rockytop

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Fan, easy to install, well if you are handy at all. it runs quiet at all 3 speeds. I replaced a broken fan in our bedroom after which I ordered 4 more to replace the fans in our other bedrooms and family room.
customer_reviews.author: RnJrabbit

customer_reviews.title: This fan is so beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bedroom and I just love the lighting it gives off. Not to bright, a nice calm relaxing brightness.
customer_reviews.author: shasta01

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Looks great. If you already have a remote, you can use your old remote for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it-
customer_reviews.text: Best fan ever. Looks good, so quiet and no wobbles even on high speed which is very hard to find. Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: numbersixteen

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. I find that this brand is quiet and well made. I feel it moves the air very well and has a great bronze finish. I have never had any problems with either of my two Emerson ceiling fans.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this fan. Put it in our kitchen. So nice and quiet. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jpope623

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It beautiful and so quiet, the color is exactly the right one ,you will love it .
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet operation.
customer_reviews.text: Our electrician only installs Emerson fans because of high quality and no call backs. Fast shipping, however, fans were shipped in original store boxes. Minor damage to boxes but no product damage.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby P

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Great small room (8x12) fan... Quality met all my expectations. Distributor was very helpful with follow-up assistance. Recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckers

customer_reviews.title: Great looking fan
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for our very dark living room. It added a nice ambient warm glow. Nice for TV watching. I read an earlier post where someone had changed out the supplied bulbs with LED giving more light. I'm happy with the supplied bulbs for my situation. Fan was very easy to assembly and there is a choose of 2 colors regarding the fan blades.
customer_reviews.author: TAMI L RICH

customer_reviews.title: ... hoping from reading the reviews that we would be happy with this fan
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping from reading the reviews that we would be happy with this fan. We are!! The installation, appearance, function and price all work together to make this purchase a highly satisfactory one.
customer_reviews.author: maryann c.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the Hunter fans I previously bought and reviewed these were a bear to assemble. They look nice and work well but assembly stunk.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I’ve been using them for about four years and I’m still pleased,
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic fan
customer_reviews.text: Liking the fan. Just be sure if you need to order a down rod that you get the 1/2" one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guy

product_meta.title: Emerson CF710WW Traditional Style 42-Inch 5-Blade Ceiling Fan, White with Frosted Globes
product_meta.description:
Size:42-Inch| Style:Pro Series II| Color:Appliance WhiteThe 42" Pro Series II Ceiling Fan in Appliance White features five reversible Appliance White/Bleached Oak blades and an integrated 3-light turtle fixture with Opal Matte glass. If so desired, the detachable light fixture may be removed and replaced with the included switch cover. "Quick Install" features, such as an easy-install mounting bracket, snap-on glass, and Precision-Lock blade arms, are incorporated to make installing your new ceiling fan a breeze. The 42” Pro Series II comes with a dual mounting option for close-to-the-ceiling or downrod installation.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Features: Five reversible blades (Appliance White/Bleached Oak), integrated light fixture (Opal Matte), 3.5" downrod, Limited lifetime warranty. Optional Accessories: SW46 wall control. Airflow: 3834 CFM (high speed). Fan speed set via a 3-speed pullchain. Fan weight: 15 lbs. Light Kit uses (3) 13 watt medium base compact fluorescent bulbs UL listed for dry locations.
feature_bullets: Precision-lock blade arms with pre-attached screws allow for quick and easy assembly of blades
Included light fixture furnished with three 13-watt medium base compact fluorescent bulbs
Removable light fixture can be replaced with switch cover If desired
Dual mounting for close-to-ceiling or down rod installation

specifications.Warranty Description: This warranty covers the motor and the other components and accessories of your emerson ceiling fan against all defects in workmanship and materials. You must be the original purchaser or user of the product to be covered. As it applies to the motor, this warranty will last for the lifetime of your ceiling fan. All other components and accessories are covered by this warranty for one year from the date you purchased your ceiling fan. Any implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose, made with respect to components and accessories is also limited to one year. Emerson electric co. Will replace a defective emerson air comfort ceiling fan motor, blade, component or other accessory at no charge to you.
